ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
1 teaspoon garlic granules, or to taste
1 teaspoon chili powder, or to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
1 pinch ground cumin, or to taste
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes for chili
1 green bell pepper, cut into strips, or to taste
1 red bell pepper, cut into strips, or to taste
½ (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles
½ teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut chicken and vegetables into similar-sized pieces for uniform cooking
Toss all ingredients with oil and spices before baking for even seasoning distribution
Bake at 425°F for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through, until chicken is cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These fajitas are easily customizable. What toppings would you add—sour cream, guacamole, cheese, or salsa?
